meanings.sent1: The preowned car had a few scratches but ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She decided to buy a preowned laptop instead of a new one.
meanings.sent3: The preowned bicycle had a mind of its own, always veering to the left.
meanings.sent4: His preowned watch carried the memories of its previous owner.
meanings.sent5: The preowned furniture brought a sense of history and character to the room.

meanings.sent1: The preowned book had notes scribbled in the margins.
meanings.sent2: They found a preowned bike at the garage sale for a great price.
meanings.sent3: The preowned jacket seemed to have a secret pocket for hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her preowned phone held stories from its previous user within its memory.
meanings.sent5: The preowned toy had a few scuff marks but still brought joy to the child.
